export const Table = ({ col1, col2, col3, col4, display, status, error, mapProps, dataArr, // onClick }) => { const clicker = (e) => { console.log(e.target) } const displayedWithProps = <> { status === 'loading' ? # Loading... Loading... Loading... : status === 'succeeded' && display.results ? display.results.map((item, i) => {i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]} { mapProps.four ? {item[mapProps.four]} : null } ) : status === 'succeeded' && display.error ? # Oh no! looks like {display.error.toLowerCase()} : status === 'failed' && error ? # Oh no! looks like {error} : null } const displayedWithoutProps = <> { dataArr ? dataArr.map((item, i) => {i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]} { mapProps.four ? {mapProps.four} : null } ) : null } return ( <> { col4 ? : null } { dataArr === undefined ? displayedWithProps : displayedWithoutProps // dataArr ? // displayedWithoutProps : // null } {/* { status && display && error ? {displayedProp} : dataArr ? dataArr.map((item, i) => { mapProps.four ? : null } ) : null } */}
# {col1} {col2} {col3}{col4}
{i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]}{item[mapProps.four]}
) }
